TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集内的主控件，用于在网页中承载 控件。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件功能中, 区域是包含 Web 部件控件的网页上的已定义区域。In the Web Parts feature, a zone is a defined region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. 区域的主要功能是布局其包含的控件, 并为这些控件提供公共用户界面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 有关区域及其在 Web 部件应用程序中的使用方式的一般信息, 请参阅基本和类的参考文档和标题为 " [Web 部件控制集概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100))" 的主题。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base and classes, and the topic entitled [Web Parts Control Set Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100)). 控件的特殊功能是包含控件, 它们构成了 Web 部件应用程序的主 UI。The special function of the control is to contain controls, which form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 控件可以在网页上以持久性格式声明, 使开发人员能够将其用作模板并在``元素内添加其他服务器控件。 A control can be declared in persistence format on a Web page, enabling developers to use it as a template and to add other server controls within the `` element. 任何类型的服务器控件 (如果添加到区域) 都可在运行时作为控件运行。Any type of server control, if added to a zone, can function as a control at run time. 无论添加的控件是控件、用户控件、自定义控件还是 ASP.NET 控件, 都是如此。This is true regardless of whether the added control is a control, a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅类的主题。For more information, see the topic for the class. 除了包含控件以外 , 控件还为它所包含的控件提供公共 UI。Besides containing controls, a control also provides a common UI for the controls it contains. 此常见的 UI (统称为 chrome) 由所有控件上的外围用户界面元素组成, 如边框、标题、页眉和页脚、样式特征和谓词 (用户可在控件上执行的 UI 操作, 如关闭或最小化)。This common UI, known collectively as chrome, consists of the peripheral UI elements on all the controls, such as the border, title, header and footer, style characteristics, and verbs (UI actions that a user can carry out on a control, such as close or minimize). > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能会以意外的方式呈现或其包含的控件的高度, 具体取决于区域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 有关更多详细信息, 请参阅 或属性的文档。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 类从基类派生其大多数行为; 它仅添加一个唯一成员, 即属性。 The class derives most of its behavior from the base and classes; it adds only one unique member, the property. 此属性引用一个对象, 该对象是一个模板, 它允许页面开发人员使用 .aspx 页面的声明性标记中``的元素以静态方式定义区域中的控件。This property references an object, which is a template that allows page developers to define the controls in a zone statically by using a `` element in the declarative markup of an .aspx page. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下, 为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准, 例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 部件页中使用控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control in a Web Parts page. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一部分演示从类继承的自定义类, 并在构造函数中设置了两个基本区域属性。The first part of the example shows a custom class that inherits from the class, and that sets two of the base zone properties in the constructor. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)] 该示例的第二部分演示包含自定义控件的页面。The second part of the example shows a page that contains the custom control. 请注意, 页面顶部需要特殊`Register`的指令, 才能引用包含自定义区域的程序集。Notice that the page requires a special `Register` directive near the top of the page to reference the assembly that contains the custom zone. 此页还包含一个``元素, 该元素在每个 Web 部件页上都是必需的。The page also contains an `` element, which is required on every Web Parts page. 表示自定义控件的 元素包含标准的ASP.NET控件。``The `` element, which represents the custom control, contains a standard ASP.NET control. 由于 控件包含在区域中, 因此控件将在运行时与控件一起包装 , 这使它能够作为控件。Because it is contained within a zone, the control will be wrapped with a control at run time, which enables it to act as a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#1)] 检查自定义控件的声明性标记。Examine the declarative markup for the custom control. 请注意, 您可以在标记中设置各种区域级别的属性, 如下面的代码示例所示。Notice that you can set various zone-level properties in the markup, as shown in the following code example. > [!NOTE] > 注意``元素的使用非常重要。It is very important to note the use of the `` element. 如 "备注" 部分中所述, 此元素在区域内需要用于包装在页面中声明的静态控件。This element, as described in the Remarks section, is required within a zone to wrap the static controls that are declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一个无参数的构造函数, 不会设置任何值。The method is a parameterless constructor and does not set any values. 但是, 派生类可以使用构造函数来设置基本区域属性, 以创建自定义区域控件的标准行为和外观。However, derived classes can use the constructor to set base zone properties, to create standard behaviors and appearance for a custom zone control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义类上使用构造函数来设置区域的几个基属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of a constructor on a custom class to set several base properties for the zone. 如果要创建具有特定行为和外观的自定义控件, 此方法可能会很有用。This approach could be useful if you want to create a custom control that has specific behaviors and appearance. 此示例的完整代码包括自定义类和承载控件的 .aspx 页, 位于类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。The full code for the example, including both the custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection GetInitialWebParts() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function GetInitialWebParts () As WebPartCollection

summary.span: 重写抽象基方法，并获取区域模板中初始的静态 控件集。

span.span: Overrides the abstract base method and gets the initial set of static controls contained within the zone's template.

returns.span: 包含区域模板中的所有 控件或其他服务器控件的 。

span.span: A that contains all the or other server controls contained in the zone's template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供抽象基方法的实现。 The method provides an implementation of the abstract base method. 基方法不提供实现, 而是声明方法, 以便派生类可以自定义如何获取属于某个区域的初始控件集, 而无需考虑个性化更改。The base method provides no implementation, but declares the method so that derived classes can customize how they will get the initial set of controls that belong in a zone, without taking personalization changes into account. 对于在区域中找到的每个服务器控件 , 将调用方法。For each server control found in the zone, the method is called. 如果控件是直接从类继承的, 则只需将其添加到区域的集合 (和控件的类似集合)。If a control inherits directly from the class, it is simply added to the zone's collection (and to the similar collection of the control). 如果控件不是直接从继承的, 则 Web 部件控件集会将控件与对象包装在一起, 从而使控件在运行时表现为控件。If a control does not inherit directly from , the Web Parts control set wraps the control with a object, which enables the control to behave as a control at run time. 类通过返回在 Web 部件页面的标记中的一``组标记中静态声明的一组控件 (如果有) 来实现基方法。 The class implements the base method by returning the set of controls (if any) that are statically declared within a set of `` tags in the markup of a Web Parts page. 如果控件在区域中声明, 则会添加该控件的子控件, 而不是控件本身。If a control is declared in a zone, the child controls of that control are added, rather than the control itself. 例如, 此实现允许您在母版页中创建一个区域, 然后在内容页中声明各个控件或服务器控件。This implementation allows you to, for example, create a zone in a master page, and then declare individual or server controls in a content page. 如果在区域中声明控件, 则这些控件将被忽略。If you declare controls in a zone, they are ignored. > [!NOTE] > 执行个性化后, 方法返回的控件的初始集合可能与区域中控件的实际运行时集合不同。The initial collection of controls returned by the method might be different from the actual run-time collection of controls in a zone, after personalization has taken place. 例如, 假设有一个包含两个控件的网页, 第一个控件包含名为`User1`的用户控件, 该控件在``标记内静态声明。For example, suppose you have a Web page with two controls, and the first one contains user control named `User1` that is statically declared within the `` tags. 如果用户加载页面并拖`User1`放到第二个区域`User1` , 则仍是通过调用第一个区域的方法返回的集合的一部分, 因为它是在该区域中声明的。If a user loads the page and drags `User1` into the second zone, then `User1` is still part of the collection that is returned by calling the method for the first zone, because it is declared in that zone. 但在运行时, 当控件加载个性化设置数据时, `User1`实际上会出现在用户拖动它的第二个区域中。But at run time, when the control loads the personalization data, `User1` actually appears in the second zone where the user dragged it.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以指示区域已向 控件进行了成功的注册。

span.span: Overrides the base method to indicate that the zone has successfully been registered with the control.

Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate

summary.span: 获取或设置对 实例的引用，该实例包含网页标记中声明的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to an instance that contains the controls declared in the markup of a Web page.

value.span: 包含区域中 控件的 。

span.span: An that contains the controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用控件中的实例 。The property refers to an instance within a control. 模板包含可在控件中声明的静态服务器控件, 包括控件、用户控件、自定义控件和 ASP.NET 控件。The template contains static server controls that you can declare within a control, including controls, user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls. 在网页的声明性标记中将静态或其他服务器控件添加到中时, 必须将``控件的标记放在一对标记中。When you add static or other server controls to a in the declarative markup of a Web page, you must place the tags for the controls within a pair of `` tags. 如果未在标记中``声明控件, 则会引发异常。If you do not declare the controls within `` tags, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 Web 部件页的声明性标记中的属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property in the declarative markup of a Web Parts page. 类概述主题的 "示例" 部分中提供了此示例的完整代码, 包括用于承载控件的自定义类和 .aspx 页。The full code for the example, including a custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 请注意, 在控件的标记中, 有一个``元素包含对日历控件的引用。Notice that, in the markup for the control, there is a `` element that contains a reference to the Calendar control. 如果要将其他控件或其他服务器控件添加到区域, 还可以在``标记中添加这些控件或其他服务器控件。If you wanted to add additional controls or other server controls to the zone, you could also add them within the `` tags. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

exception.span: 区域中 控件的注册工作已完成。

span.span: Registration of the controls in the zone is already complete.
